description:
We are a professional, inclusive, and supportive beauty consulting agency. Our goal is to empower beauty professionals with the tools and resources to grow their beauty business with confidence.

Our work environment includes:
• Growth opportunities
• Flexible working hours
• On-the-job training

Job Overview

Seeking a highly motivated and results-driven Sales Consultant to join our team. As a Sales Consultant, you will be responsible for generating new leads, building relationships with potential clients, and closing sales. This is an exciting opportunity to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment where you can make a significant impact.

Responsibilities

- Conduct outside sales activities to generate leads and meet sales targets

- Develop and maintain strong relationships with prospective and existing clients

- Identify client needs and recommend appropriate services

- Deliver sales presentations and demonstrations to potential clients

- Negotiate contracts and close sales deals

- Stay up-to-date with beauty industry trends and market conditions

- Utilize Excel or Google Sheets to track sales activities and manage customer accounts

Qualifications
• Experience with B2B sales, preferably in the beauty industry
• 1+ years' of sales consulting experience
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills
• Ability to multi-task, organize, and prioritize work
• Ability to analyze market trends and identify opportunities for growth
• Ability to work independently as well as collaborate effectively within a team
• Familiarity with account management

If you are a self-motivated individual with a passion for sales, we want to hear from you. Join our team as a Sales Consultant and take your career to new heights!
• This is a commission-based role*
